notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: Sorry, an unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

hero.title: Hi, I'm Richard
hero.subtitle: QA Lead | AI-Driven QA Strategy | Test Automation
hero.description: I lead and build modern QA teams that keep pace with rapid software development and the rise of AI. I focus on AI-driven testing and agentic approaches to eliminate routine work and shift quality left. I see QA as a partner to product and engineering, not a final gatekeeper — automation handles execution, QA focuses on risks and continuous improvement. I stay hands-on: Playwright, TypeScript, CI/CD, Azure.

responsibilities: Leading QA across projects with responsibility for QA strategy and test automation direction.
Building scalable QA processes and mentoring QA engineers.
Introducing AI-driven and agent-based QA approaches to optimize testing activities.
Aligning quality with product and engineering goals.
Designing and developing automations for new and existing projects using Playwright.
QA People Management: Overseeing team performance and workload.
Mentoring: Design and maintenance of automated tests (Cypress) for critical scenarios.
Proposing quality improvements and effective stakeholder communication.
Optimization of test scenarios, BE/FE testing (E2E, integration).

vision.title: My Approach
vision.text: Technology is important, but at the end of the day, it's about people. I'm a team player with a positive approach to work and life. I believe that a happy and motivated team is the foundation for delivering a quality product. My job is not just to set up processes, but mainly to create an environment where people enjoy working and where everyone has room to grow.

intro.title: When I close my notebook...
intro.description: Technology is my profession, but my real passion is the world outside. A world where every step, every breath, and every sunrise counts. I believe in balance and that the best ideas come when you have a clear mind – and I clear mine best in the mountains or by the sea.

categories.name: Mountains
categories.description: I love being in the mountains most. That feeling when you reach the summit and get rewarded with the views you can share... Or early in the morning, before dawn, putting on ski touring equipment and heading towards silence, empty slopes, and the sunrise.

categories.name: Water and Running
categories.description: I equally love mornings on a yacht when the sun wakes you up and the first thing you do is jump into the sea. Running in nature is for me a form of active meditation. I switch off and solutions to problems that are bothering me naturally flow through my head.

sideHustle.title: My Hospitality Project: Apartmány Iwona
sideHustle.description: This isn't about code, but about people. In my free time, I passionately manage our family guesthouse. I take care of the complete guest experience – from pricing and communication during reservations to final maintenance, cleaning (with emphasis on eco-friendly products), and creating an atmosphere where people can not only be active but truly relax.
